name: Graget
description:
You are a space soldier trying to go to a planet.Then you are stoped by a walll like creature.you have to defeat him to pass.to help you the creature has given you control of the magnets of the arena but has placed your gun on the middle so to use it you have to fly/fall to it.

GOOD LUCK

instructions{

Click to swich magnets

reach the platform in the middle to shoot.

Shoot 200 times to win

}

IT WAS MADE IN 12 HOURS BECAUSE I WAS BUSY ON THE WEEKENDS
